classic.name: Brandenburg Gate
classic.description: Restored 18th-century gate & landmark with 12 Doric columns topped by a classical goddess statue.

classic.name: Reichstag Building
classic.description: Neo-Renaissance parliament building topped by a Norman Foster glass dome with 360-degree city views.

classic.name: German Museum of Technology
classic.description: Transport & technological museum with an airplane on the roof, set in a green park with windmills.

classic.name: East Side Gallery
classic.description: Conserved graffiti project by 118 artists covering part of the Berlin Wall & celebrating its demise.

classic.name: Olympiastadion Berlin
classic.description: Sporting arena, built for the 1936 Olympics, with 74,649 seats, a soccer pitch & an athletics track.

classic.name: Berlin Cathedral
classic.description: Majestic 1800s cathedral with an organ with 7,269 pipes, plus royal tombs & a dome for city views.

classic.name: Charlottenburg Palace
classic.description: Baroque summer palace with huge gardens & rooms packed with paintings, tapestries & porcelain.

classic.name: Berlin Wall Memorial
classic.description: Commemorative stretch of the historic divide with a preserved section of original wall & memorial.

classic.name: New National Gallery
classic.description: European & American 20th-century masterpieces on display in a Mies van der Rohe-designed museum.

classic.name: Topography of Terror
classic.description: Modern center on the site of the former Gestapo headquarters, documenting the horrors of Nazism.

foodie.name: Holzmarkt 25
foodie.description: Park known for its riverside views, dotted with bohemian bars & food stands for pizzas or burgers.

foodie.name: Dussmann das KulturKaufhaus
foodie.description: Massive bookshop offering a variety of literary genres, plus gifts, records, events & a cafe.

foodie.name: Café Peri
foodie.description: Turkish brunch cafe serving spicy baked potatoes, menemen scrambled eggs & börek pastries.

foodie.name: Deutsche Oper Berlin
foodie.description: Modern theater, with capacity for 1885, hosting a program of opera & ballet, plus a chic restaurant.

foodie.name: Rausch Schokoladenhaus
foodie.description: Sophisticated chocolatier showcasing unique confections in an expansive space with an upstairs cafe.

foodie.name: La Maison Berlin
foodie.description: Sandwiches, quiche, soup & pastries, plus smoothies, coffee & tea, in a casual cafe with a terrace.

adventure.name: Holzmarkt 25
adventure.description: Park known for its riverside views, dotted with bohemian bars & food stands for pizzas or burgers.

adventure.name: Berlin Treptower Park
adventure.description: Partly-forested riverfront park with a promenade, pedalos, a Soviet War Memorial & an observatory.

adventure.name: Berlin Wall Memorial
adventure.description: Commemorative stretch of the historic divide with a preserved section of original wall & memorial.

adventure.name: Tempelhofer Feld
adventure.description: Former airport-turned-public park, with massive lawns for biking, walking, picnics & recreation.

adventure.name: Gardens of the World
adventure.description: Park with Asian, Christian & Renaissance themed gardens, home to sculptures, flowers & buildings.

adventure.name: Grunewald
adventure.description: Vast forested area on the Havel river with lakes & ponds, plus trails for hiking & mountain biking.

adventure.name: Teufelssee
adventure.description: This picturesque lake with a backdrop of lush foliage is known as a clothing-optional swimming spot.

adventure.name: Volkspark Rehberge
adventure.description: Park with woods, lakes & a fountain, plus sports fields, stadium, toboggan run & outdoor theater.

adventure.name: Mauerpark
adventure.description: Park with grassland & trees set on the site of the former border between East & West Berlin.

adventure.name: Tierpark Berlin
adventure.description: Huge, tree-studded zoo with a variety of global animals in sprawling enclosures.

cultural.name: German Museum of Technology
cultural.description: Transport & technological museum with an airplane on the roof, set in a green park with windmills.

cultural.name: Friedrichstadt-Palast
cultural.description: Historic theater featuring revue shows & other performances, plus a basement comedy club.

cultural.name: Berlin State Opera
cultural.description: Classical state opera house, reconstructed after WWII, staging ballet & a repertoire of operas.

cultural.name: Stage Theater des Westens
cultural.description: Famous 19th-century theater with ornate decor, presenting a program of operas & musical works.

cultural.name: Berlin Wall Memorial
cultural.description: Commemorative stretch of the historic divide with a preserved section of original wall & memorial.

cultural.name: New National Gallery
cultural.description: European & American 20th-century masterpieces on display in a Mies van der Rohe-designed museum.

cultural.name: Topography of Terror
cultural.description: Modern center on the site of the former Gestapo headquarters, documenting the horrors of Nazism.

cultural.name: East Side Gallery
cultural.description: Conserved graffiti project by 118 artists covering part of the Berlin Wall & celebrating its demise.

cultural.name: Gemäldegalerie
cultural.description: European 13th-18th-century masterpieces, including works by Rembrandt & Rubens, in a modern museum.
cultural.address: Johanna und Eduard Arnhold Platz, 10785 Berlin, Germany

relaxation.name: Holzmarkt 25
relaxation.description: Park known for its riverside views, dotted with bohemian bars & food stands for pizzas or burgers.

relaxation.name: Hotel Palace Berlin
relaxation.description: Refined rooms & suites, some with zoo views, plus a gin bar, an indoor pool & a spa.

relaxation.name: Berlin Treptower Park
relaxation.description: Partly-forested riverfront park with a promenade, pedalos, a Soviet War Memorial & an observatory.

relaxation.name: Berlin Wall Memorial
relaxation.description: Commemorative stretch of the historic divide with a preserved section of original wall & memorial.

relaxation.name: Tempelhofer Feld
relaxation.description: Former airport-turned-public park, with massive lawns for biking, walking, picnics & recreation.

relaxation.name: Gardens of the World
relaxation.description: Park with Asian, Christian & Renaissance themed gardens, home to sculptures, flowers & buildings.

relaxation.name: Vabali
relaxation.description: Treatments are available at this Bali-style spa facility with 2-hour, 4-hour & day tickets.

relaxation.name: Botanical Volkspark Pankow Blankenfelde
relaxation.description: Early 20th-century greenhouse nurturing endangered plants, plus an area dedicated to trees & shrubs.

relaxation.name: Mauerpark
relaxation.description: Park with grassland & trees set on the site of the former border between East & West Berlin.

nightlife.name: Holzmarkt 25
nightlife.description: Park known for its riverside views, dotted with bohemian bars & food stands for pizzas or burgers.

nightlife.name: Ständige Vertretung
nightlife.description: Tavern with arched windows & framed photos of politicians on the walls, serving Rhenish cuisine.

nightlife.name: La Maison Berlin
nightlife.description: Sandwiches, quiche, soup & pastries, plus smoothies, coffee & tea, in a casual cafe with a terrace.

nightlife.name: Clash
nightlife.description: Buzzing alternative bar & club, with a beer garden & weekly menu of global bites.

nightlife.name: Berlin TV Tower
nightlife.description: 368m-tall tower, opened in 1969, with a viewing gallery at 203m and revolving restaurant at 207m.

nightlife.name: Klunkerkranich
nightlife.description: Sprawling cultural venue featuring a roof terrace, casual food & concerts, plus a cocktail bar.

nightlife.name: Scandic Berlin Potsdamer Platz
nightlife.description: Modern Scandinavian-inspired lodging with refined rooms & casual dining, plus a sauna & a gym.

nightlife.name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Berlin Alexanderplatz
nightlife.description: Modern rooms with free Wi-Fi in an urban hotel featuring a Mediterranean restaurant & a spa area.

nightlife.name: Soda Club Berlin
nightlife.description: Vibrant spot with a spacious terrace serving comfort food, veggie options & happy-hour specials.

trendy.name: Dussmann das KulturKaufhaus
trendy.description: Massive bookshop offering a variety of literary genres, plus gifts, records, events & a cafe.

trendy.name: Café Peri
trendy.description: Turkish brunch cafe serving spicy baked potatoes, menemen scrambled eggs & börek pastries.

trendy.name: Rausch Schokoladenhaus
trendy.description: Sophisticated chocolatier showcasing unique confections in an expansive space with an upstairs cafe.

trendy.name: La Maison Berlin
trendy.description: Sandwiches, quiche, soup & pastries, plus smoothies, coffee & tea, in a casual cafe with a terrace.
